answers.answer: Not a sir....but.....Anything over 100 is considered pre-diabetic. Is there a reason you are suspecting diabetes? Do you have symptoms?
i have no symptoms only feet pain only.

Since you are technically considered pre-diabetic at 100 I would encourage you to learn more about how diet, exercise and weight loss can slow down or prevent the progression to full-blown diabetes. Good luck to you.

question: Dear Sir,my fasting blood glucose level is 100 mg and random 87 mg i am diabetic? my father was non diabetic.
title: diabetic
